name: WakeUp
0:
”Alexa, open wake up”
”Alexa, ask wake up to set alarm for 7 A.M. tomorrow”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wake up
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Wake Up - the ultimate skill designed to shake you out of your slumber and start your day with a burst of energy. Sometimes, we all need an extra push to rise up and shine, and this skill is here to provide that. 'I wake up!' is a unique skill that specializes in doing one thing and doing it extremely well — repeatedly shouting “Wake up!” As many times as you like, which helps you get rid of the clutches of morning sleepiness. You can create a reminder or alarm to wake up at any time, any day.

For Fire TV and Kindle users, to open the skill, just say “open wake up skill”.

This skill uses Alexa Shopping to make purchases on Amazon. Alexa allows purchasing by voice using your default payment and shipping settings. You can set a voice confirmation code, turn off purchasing, and see product and order details in your Alexa app.

You can ask for the following products through Alexa Shopping:

Alarm Clock for Bedroom
Echo Show Five
Echo Dot with Clock

Unlock more annoying voices from a Voices Pack.

Voices Pack One:

Loud
Fast
Slow
High Pitch
Little Girl's Voice

Voices Pack Two:

Whisper/ASMR
Low Pitch
Quiet/Soft
Little Boy's Voice
Karen Voice

Voices Pack Three:

Wojak
Boomer
Spanish
French
Japanese

Get the latest update and discover more Alexa Skills like this by following the Facebook page, Alexa Sounds and Noises Skills.
